_header: A good man there was and a clean / A clerk men callen John
Note: For other versions, see 58 and 2965. See also 601, 2655.
_description: The story of Barlaam and Josaphat — in couplets

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines:
A good mon þer was and a cleneA clerk men callen Ion
                    Damascene…
BodEngPoeta1.Last Lines:
…And at heore toumbe mony onMiracle is wrouht þorwh Godus
                    loon
BodEngPoeta1.Note:
Missing text due to loss of f. 102. Last lines on f. 101v:
                    ‘Confus awei þen gon he wende / Til he com to his secunde
                    frende’; first lines on f. 103: ‘I schal lete set vp verreyliche /
                    An ymage of gold al to þe liche’.
